Articles.Content: 1234: you see a sign that says: "1234 more flights to go!" and you wonder why you were even convinced to go up this building - you also go to Five Kerbs for a quick stop to eat and go to a hotel for the night.

1235: You realise a sign that says 'You are (roughly) 3705m above ground level please don't jump out of the window because you'll die by hitting the floor... or hitting a passing test plane and killing the pilot and yourself... Please don't Jeb'. You jump out of the window and a combination of wind and jet backdraft makes you go up to the next floor with a badass smooth landing into the window.
1236: you are sitting on a glass floor and you see someone jump out of the previous floor and glide upwards until crashing into you.

1237: You get up to this floor - and it's made up of sweets and deliciousness... You resist the urge and press on, but only after you've stopped to have a bite...

or two...

or more...

It has a elevator which has 5 buttons. 4 are listed as 1,2,3,4. The last is unlisted. You write 'swimming in gold'

And press the button. The elevator stops and the door opens you are blinded by the sight and promtly feinted. The lift takes you to the next floor..
1239: Turns out that this isn't liquid gold, but the surface of the Sun. You burn immediately, and you regenerate like the Doctor on the next floor.
1240:
1241: There's a small campfire burning in the corner.
1242: Express Elevator to Floor 9000. You don't take it.
1243: You see a massive moon-like space station orbiting around a Gas giant with a forest moon.
1244: Cheese! Cheese for EVERYONE!
1245: you see a old nintendo NES console. "Oldskool!" You proclaim.
1246: You see the development center for Wargaming's World of Warships (still in closed beta, to my knowledge)
1247: You happen to be in a room with a bunch of donuts, but Officer Beepsky randomly harasses you until you go to the next floor.
1248: You see a primary school teacher trying to teach GabeN to count to 3
1249: Minecraft break
1250: You see a man.
1251: The room is creepily empty. It smells horrible.
1251: you see a some history books. after reading them you discover that they are the kerbal history thread books. you take KH remastered with you.
1252: The elevator screeches to a halt, the cable snaps and you start to fall.
1253: You jump out of the falling elevator from up there to 1253. You survive, and you look out of the balcony: A U-2 spyplane buzzes the tower
1254: There's a giant spider. You sprint to the next floor.
1255: The time is 12:56 PM on your watch. You get turned upside down.
1256: you look at the time and rush for the next floor
1257: You see a poster of three men and it says "LONELY DRIVERS"
